SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Arrow
Extends the Entity class to create Arrows
Bow
Extends the Entity class to create a Bow.
Button
Extends the Component class with a Textfield and a Runnable action
Component
Baseclass for a Component
Controller
Handles Player input
Corosshair
Provides functionalities to create and handle a crosshair on the screen Currently also holds attack charging functionalties, which might be moved to Arrow or Bow later on.
Entity
Creates an Entity that serves as a base for Monsters and other actors.
Gameloop
Handles Events regarding the gameloop.
Hitbox
Extends the Rectangle class to add offsets for an entity location and a damage multiplier to create different hitbox types like cirtical hitbox.
ImageMapping
Dataclass to store ImageMappings.
Level1
Creates the level1 screen.
Loader
Loads assets from the asset folder.
Main
Main class.
Menu
Creates the menu screen.
Monster
Creates and handles Monster objects.
MonsterSpawner
Contains utilities to Spawn new Monsters
MonsterValues
Stores the blueprints for Monsters.
Rectangle
Provides functionalities to create and calculate with rectangles.
Renderer
Renders the game view to the screen
Scene
Baseclass for any Scene.
SceneHandler
Provides functionalities to switch between scenes.
SoundMapping
Dataclass to store SoundMappings.
StaticValues
Dataclass to store fixed values
StaticValues.Corners
Available Rectangle corners
StaticValues.SceneTag
Available Tags for a Scene
Textfield
Extends the Compnent class by adding text, that can be drawn on a surface.
Utilities
Provides functionalitites like - image rotation, - angle calculation between two points.
Wave
Holds types of Monsters and and amount for each type.
WaveSpawner
Extends the MonsterSpawner to create Monsters from a List and allows to limit the amount of a Monster TYPE.
